name: UZG Prototype
description:
A COD Zombies-inspired game. This project was mainly created for learning purposes.  May or may not receive updates.

NOTCE: The browser version does not have fog nor do the zombie eyes glow.  Most likely because it is unsupported in Web-GL builds :( Everything works as intended in the standalone build.

Remember to click in the game window to focus it!

It may take a while to load.  Unfortunately, Unity Web-GL runs noticeably worse than standalone builds, highly recommend downloading the standalone build.

Controls

wasd - move

t - check mag

y - inspect

r - reload

left click - shoot / cancel insert bullet reload

right click - hold  to ads

shift - run

g - instantly throw grenade

v - knife/melee

b - change fire mode

p - pause menu
